# Evaluation  {.unnumbered}


## Plan the evaluation

### What triggers the evaluation?

Typical triggers are:

- Missed outbreak
- Increased disease importance
- Occurrence of new public health event
- Cost saving
- Requirement to evaluate (IHR)
- New technology

<br><br><br>

### What attributes should be monitored?
- Depends on the trigger
- Many attributes are costly
- Keep the balance of attributes in mind
![](../img/overview_choice.jpg)


<br><br><br>

## Perform the evaluation

1. Start with a evaluation protocol
1. Describe the system
1. Engate stakeholders
1. Set up a team
1. Look at each attribute in its own way

<br><br><br>





<br><br><br>

## Propose an action plan

- An evaluation is objective oriented 
- It should focus on improving the system
